230937d4-27c0-4fb0-9585-f1dfdf97b6a8.name: RepeatUntilFailure
230937d4-27c0-4fb0-9585-f1dfdf97b6a8.title: Repeat Until Failure
230937d4-27c0-4fb0-9585-f1dfdf97b6a8.description: Repeats the child node maxLoop times, or until failure, excluding RUNNING ticks. Updates context.repeatCount

ffd888c0-ae5e-4285-ab4f-65421a4901fb.name: SetFieldAction
ffd888c0-ae5e-4285-ab4f-65421a4901fb.title: counter=0
ffd888c0-ae5e-4285-ab4f-65421a4901fb.description: Set fields across global,context, volatile and message memories. fieldName and fieldValue should have a dot notation with the object name. Eg: message.chat_message, context.amount etc

f386697d-8aee-45ee-8384-1edf1edde7df.name: SetFieldAction
f386697d-8aee-45ee-8384-1edf1edde7df.title: counter++
f386697d-8aee-45ee-8384-1edf1edde7df.description: Set fields across global,context, volatile and message memories. fieldName and fieldValue should have a dot notation with the object name. Eg: message.chat_message, context.amount etc

b84ffc1b-9d51-4e9e-87e1-671714bf818d.name: FieldCompareCondition
b84ffc1b-9d51-4e9e-87e1-671714bf818d.title: counter<=3
b84ffc1b-9d51-4e9e-87e1-671714bf818d.description: Compare fields across global,context, volatile and message memories. left and right operands should have a dot notation with the object name. Eg: message.chat_message, context.amount etc. Operator could be any logical operator like ===, <, <==, !==, ==> etc.
